name: Zork 2 Remake
description:
WARNING! - you will need dedicated graphics to run this game. This game will be more optimized than Zork Remake.

This Australian Indie studio is committed to converting the old Infocom text adventures to 3d first person adventures. Zork 2 Remake is the second of these to be developed. These infocom remakes are practically exactly the same as the originals.

Instructions for playing the free pre-release demo -
WASD - move
Mouse - look around
Left click - interact
Right click - inventory / save / load / quit
Space - jump

The Zork 2 Remake is a puzzle adventure game of the past. Like the original, this game has no instructions or quest markers. It
is up to te player to figure out how to progress. The only hint is to PROGRESS! You will know once you have won.
